description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier.
levelupDescription: When you've cast 7+ spells this game<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When you've cast 7+ spells this game.
flavorText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
name: Lee Sin
